titleStmt.title: An Account of the last hours of Dr. Peter du Moulin, minister of Gods word, and professor of divinity at Sedan who dyed in the said town, March 10, 1658, stylo novo / translated into English out of the French copy printed at Sedan.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.L. ... for Rich. Davis,

notesStmt.note: Originally published in French as: Récit des dernières heures de Monsieur du Moulin. Cf. Madan 2381.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
